summary: When the leading lady of a low-budget musical revue sprains her ankle, the assistant stage manager is forced to understudy and perform in her place, becoming a star and finding love in the process.
cast: Twiggy|Christopher Gable|Max Adrian|Bryan Pringle|Murray Melvin|Moyra Fraser|Georgina Hale|Sally Bryant|Vladek Sheybal|Tommy Tune|Brian Murphy|Graham Armitage|Antonia Ellis|Caryl Little|Anne Jameson|Catherine Willmer|Robert La Bassiere|Barbara Windsor|Imogen Claire|Susan Claire|Peter Greenwell|Cheryl Grunwald|Glenda Jackson|Steven Longhurst|Petra Siniawski
title: El novio
